EmailTemplate.name: SCN Submitted
EmailTemplate.subject: Sold Case Notification submitted for Approval - {!Employer_Group_Data__c.Opportunity_Account_Name__c}/DBA: {!Employer_Group_Data__c.DBA_Name__c} {!Employer_Group_Data__c.Email_Employer_Type__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
The Sold Case Notification {!Employer_Group_Data__c.Name} for {!Employer_Group_Data__c.Opportunity_Account_Name__c}/DBA: {!Employer_Group_Data__c.DBA_Name__c}, {!Employer_Group_Data__c.Email_Employer_Type__c} has been submitted for review and is now available in the {!Employer_Group_Data__c.OwnerFullName}.
Thank you.
